title: Don't show this to the Ola clown and Narayanamurthy.
selftext: We all know what will happen
comments: Then why did you post it ? What makes you think those losers who have plenty of time won't be lurking here with a reddit account with some random anonymous names ?
I really feel sad seeing this pictureðŸ˜ŽðŸ«£ðŸ˜¢
You're joking, right? Mattiman8888 is a distinguished individual followed by the cream of the crop.
Jokes fly over some people head just like common sense. Satire is dead guys.
